metadata.name: SHADOW Beacon 01 â€“ ALPHA
metadata.description: This NFT acts as a beacon that manifests a presence on Ethereum mainnet of a House SHADOW Tomb on Polygon. The beacon enables the SHADOW Tomb to participate in mainnet functionality such as Recovery. The NFT has no intrinsic value, and is bound to the owner of the corresponding SHADOW Tomb token on Polygon. To view the token on Polygon, go here: https://opensea.io/assets/matic/0xe877cdacbb7827d4232cde5f8de58371f144a0a4/1
